text: Magar jo log sood (usury) khate hain, unka haal us shaks ka sa hota hai, jisey Shaytan ne choo kar bawla (deewana) kardiya ho aur is haalat mein unke mubtila hone ki wajah yeh hai ke woh kehte hain : “ tijarat bhi to aakhir sood hi jaisi cheez hai”, halanke Allah ne tijarat ko halal kiya hai aur sood ko haraam. Lihaza jis shaks ko uske Rubb ki taraf se yeh naseehat pahunche aur aainda ke liye woh sood-khori se baaz aa jaye , to jo kuch woh pehle kha chuka, so kha chuka, uska maamla Allah ke hawale hai aur jo is hukm ke baad phir isi harakat ka iaada (repeat) karey, toh jahannami hai, jahan woh hamesha rahega
